utilities
Class convert_unit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--utilities.convert_unit
public class convert_unit
extends java.lang.Object

Overview
The convert_unit class stores conversion constants for manipulation of concentrations and mixing ratios. This file reduces the likelyhood of magic numbers appearing in the code.
Derivation of mixing ratio and concentration connversion

 P -      Pressure in atms
 Pi -     Partial pressure of species i
 Pt -     Total pressure
 Pi/Pt -  Volume (and mole) fraction of species i
 PPMi -   Parts per million of species i
 V -      Volume in m^3
 ni -     Number of moles of species i
 R -      gas law const
 R =      82.06 E-6 atm-m^3/(gmol-K)
 T -      Temperature in kelvin
 MWi -    Molecular weight of species i (grams/mole)
 Mi -     Mass of species i (grams)

 PV = nRT                - ideal gas law
 n/V = P/(RT)            - n/V (moles/m^3) is a concentration
 ni*MWi/V = Mi/V         - convert from moles to grams
 Mi/V = Pi*MWi/(RT)      - n*MWi/V (grams/m^3)
 PPMi = Pi/Pt * 10^6
 Pi = PPMi * Pt * 10^(-6)
 ************************************************************
 Releationship between mass and mixing ratios
 Mi/V = PPMi * Pt/(10^6) * MWi/(RT)        LHS [g/m^3]
 PPMi =  Mi/V * 10^6/Pt * RT/MWi           LHS [ppmv]
 ************************************************************
  *

Method Detail

grams_per_mile_per_hour_to_grams_per_meter_per_second

public static double grams_per_mile_per_hour_to_grams_per_meter_per_second(double grams_per_mile_per_hour)
Convert the dimensions grams per mile per hour to grams per meter per second. This conversion is required because the ucd 2001 model requires pollutant flowrates in g/m/s but most emission data appears in grams/mile/hour

mmHg_to_ATMS

public static double mmHg_to_ATMS(double mmHG)
Convert a pressure in milimeters mecury to the presure unit ATMS.

                                              double temperature_in_K,
                                              double MW)
convert a concentration from ppmv to g/m^3
Parameters:
ppm_conc - - concentration in ppmv
pressure_atm - - pressure in atms
temperature_in_K - - absolute temperature in kelvin
MW - - molecular weight of the species
